tool_description:
An API showing the top NFT collections and NFT sales in the last 24hrs, week, month or all time!
Just updated for faster response times !
name: Top NFT Collections and Sales
title: Top NFT Collections and Sales

api_list.name: Get Top NFT Collections Today
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the top NFT collections based on the last 24 hours.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-nft-collections-and-sales.p.rapidapi.com/collections/1d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-nft-collections-and-sales.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
